flawed_nl_solution:
Harry ran 10 x 50/100 = <<10*50/100=20/1>>20/1 meters per hour faster on Tuesday to Wednesday.
So he ran 10 + 20/1 = <<10+20/1=30>>30 meters per hour from Tuesday to Thursday.
Then on Friday, he ran 30 x 60/100 = <<30*60/100=18>>18 meters per hour more.
Therefore, he ran 30 + 18 = <<30+18=48>>48 meters per hour on Friday.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 20/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
